terms.title: Terms of Use for {{appName}}
terms.intro: Welcome to {{appName}}. Your use of the website, the application, and our services is subject to your acceptance of the terms of use detailed below. Please read them carefully.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.body:
‚Ä¢ By using the website, the application, or our services, you agree to these Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy.
‚Ä¢ If you do not agree, you must refrain from using our services.
‚Ä¢ These terms apply to all users ‚Äî clients, lawyers, and system administrators.

section2.title: 2. Services We Provide
section2.body:
We provide a legal management platform that includes:

‚Ä¢ Creating and managing legal cases, including stages, tags, and filtering
‚Ä¢ Managing clients and case managers
‚Ä¢ Digital signing of documents with OTP verification
‚Ä¢ Uploading files and evidence documents
‚Ä¢ Sending notifications and messages (Push, email, SMS)
‚Ä¢ Automated reminders (license renewals, case reminders, birthday greetings)
‚Ä¢ User role management and permissions

section3.title: 3. Registration and User Accounts
section3.body:
‚Ä¢ Using the services requires registration with a phone number and receiving a one-time OTP code for identification.
‚Ä¢ During registration and usage, we may store data such as name, phone number, email address, company name, date of birth, and profile picture.
‚Ä¢ Use of the system is limited to users assigned roles (administrators and clients).
‚Ä¢ The responsibility for keeping login credentials confidential lies solely with the user.

section4.title: 4. Digital Signing
section4.body:
‚Ä¢ The system allows digital signing of legal documents.
‚Ä¢ Signatures are verified via an OTP code sent to the signer's phone number.
‚Ä¢ A signed document constitutes acknowledgment by the signer that they have read, understood, and agreed to the content of the document.
‚Ä¢ Digital signatures are stored with a timestamp and identification details and cannot be altered after execution.
‚Ä¢ The user is responsible for reviewing the document before signing.

section5.title: 5. File and Document Uploads
section5.body:
‚Ä¢ The system allows uploading files and evidence documents to cases.
‚Ä¢ The user is responsible for ensuring that uploaded files do not infringe copyrights or any other law.
‚Ä¢ We reserve the right to limit file types, sizes, and quantities according to the service plan.
‚Ä¢ Uploaded files are stored securely on our storage servers.

section6.title: 6. Notifications and Messages
section6.body:
‚Ä¢ The system sends notifications and messages to users via Push, email, and SMS.
‚Ä¢ Notifications include, among others: case updates, signing invitations, reminders, and automated messages.
‚Ä¢ The system may send automated birthday greetings based on the date of birth entered in the profile.
‚Ä¢ Notification channels can be controlled through the system settings.
‚Ä¢ By providing your phone number, you consent to receiving SMS messages (including OTP, updates, and reminders).

section7.title: 7. Privacy and Data Protection
section7.body:
‚Ä¢ Your information is stored in a secure database.
‚Ä¢ We use token-based authentication (JWT) to protect user access.
‚Ä¢ Personal information will not be shared with third parties without your consent, except where required by law.
‚Ä¢ We use third-party services for sending messages (such as email and SMS), but your details will not be used for marketing unrelated to the service.
‚Ä¢ We maintain activity logs for security and auditing purposes.

section8.title: 8. Fair Use and Prohibited Activities
section8.body:
When using our services, you agree:

‚Ä¢ Not to use the services for unlawful purposes.
‚Ä¢ Not to disrupt the system or attempt to breach data stores.
‚Ä¢ Not to submit false or misleading information.
‚Ä¢ Not to upload harmful files or malicious software.
‚Ä¢ Not to share access credentials with third parties.

section9.title: 9. Service Limits and Plans
section9.body:
‚Ä¢ The service may be limited according to the selected plan (number of cases, storage volume, number of users, etc.).
‚Ä¢ Exceeding plan limits may result in blocking or restricting certain features.
‚Ä¢ Plans can be upgraded at any time through the system settings or by contacting us.

section10.title: 10. Liability and Indemnification
section10.body:
‚Ä¢ We strive to provide stable and reliable services, but we do not guarantee uninterrupted availability.
‚Ä¢ The company will not be liable for indirect, consequential, or incidental damages resulting from use of the service.
‚Ä¢ Users are responsible for safeguarding their access credentials and the information they enter.
‚Ä¢ The service does not constitute a substitute for professional legal advice.

section11.title: 11. Changes and Updates
section11.body:
‚Ä¢ We reserve the right to change these Terms of Use at any time.
‚Ä¢ Updates will be published on the website and in the application.
‚Ä¢ Continued use of the service after an update constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
‚Ä¢ We recommend reviewing the terms from time to time.

section12.title: 12. Contact
section12.body: ‚Ä¢ If you have questions regarding these Terms of Use, you can contact us at: {{email}}.

compliance.disclaimer: Compliance program in progress. These controls are aligned with the listed standards but have not yet been formally certified by an accredited registrar.

hub.overviewText: We are committed to protecting your data and maintaining the highest standards of information security, privacy, and business continuity. Our compliance program is aligned with internationally recognised ISO standards.
hub.securityDesc: How we protect your information ‚Äî encryption, access controls, monitoring.
hub.privacyDesc: How we handle personal data ‚Äî privacy by design, data minimisation.
hub.continuityDesc: How we ensure service availability ‚Äî backups, disaster recovery, uptime.

security.whatIsText: ISO/IEC 27001 is the international standard for Information Security Management Systems (ISMS). It provides a systematic approach to managing sensitive data and ensuring it remains secure through risk management processes.
security.whatItMeansText: Your case data, documents, and communications are protected by industry-leading security controls. We continuously monitor and improve our security posture to safeguard your information.
security.whatWeDoText:
• End-to-end encryption for data in transit (TLS 1.2+)
  • Encryption at rest for stored documents
  • Multi-factor authentication (OTP-based)
  • Role-based access control with least-privilege principle
  • Comprehensive audit logging (ISO 27001 Annex A compliant)
  • Automated rate limiting and brute-force protection
  • Security headers (HSTS, CSP, X-Frame-Options)
  • Regular vulnerability assessments
security.roadmapText: Formal ISO/IEC 27001 certification audit planned. Continuous improvement of controls through regular internal audits and penetration testing.
security.statusText: Aligned with ISO/IEC 27001 controls. Formal certification in progress.

privacy.whatIsText: ISO/IEC 27701 extends ISO 27001 with privacy-specific controls, creating a Privacy Information Management System (PIMS). It helps organisations comply with privacy regulations such as GDPR and the Israeli Privacy Protection Law.
privacy.whatItMeansText: Your personal data is handled with the utmost care. We collect only what is necessary, store it securely, and never share it without your explicit consent or legal obligation.
privacy.whatWeDoText:
• Data minimisation ‚Äî we collect only what is needed
  • Purpose limitation ‚Äî data is used only for stated purposes
  • Secure deletion ‚Äî data is permanently removed when no longer needed
  • Privacy by design in all new features
  • PII masking in logs and audit trails
  • Consent management for communications
  • Data subject rights support (access, rectification, erasure)
privacy.roadmapText: Formal ISO/IEC 27701 certification as an extension to ISO 27001. Enhanced data processing records and DPIA procedures.
privacy.statusText: ISO/IEC 27701-ready. Privacy controls implemented and operational.

continuity.whatIsText: ISO 22301 is the international standard for Business Continuity Management Systems (BCMS). It ensures that organisations can continue to deliver products and services during disruptions.
continuity.whatItMeansText: Your access to case management, documents, and signed files is protected against service disruptions. We have recovery procedures in place to minimise downtime.
continuity.whatWeDoText:
• Automated database backups with point-in-time recovery
  • Cloud storage redundancy (Cloudflare R2 with multi-region replication)
  • Application health monitoring and auto-restart (PM2)
  • Incident response procedures with structured logging
  • Graceful degradation under high load
  • Server-side request timeouts to prevent cascade failures
continuity.roadmapText: Formal business impact analysis (BIA). Documented disaster recovery plan with defined RTOs and RPOs. Regular DR drills.
continuity.statusText: Business continuity principles based on ISO 22301. Formal assessment planned.
